text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>Bey Herrn Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE> in <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE> in <FORMAT>groß 8vº.</FORMAT> von <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR> in <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>, ohngebunden <PRIZE>46. kr.</PRIZE>; gebunden in Leder und Schloß à <PRIZE>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vº.</FORMAT> ohngebunden à <PRIZE>6. Batzen;</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anfäng der Geographie</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vº.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vº.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>12. Batzen;</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vº.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Gespräch von den Würmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE> à <PRIZE>8. Rappen,</PRIZE> und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":3,"explanation":"Made 3 corrections: 1) Added missing closing tag </BIBL> after \"6. Batzen;\" for \"Memoires de Rochester\" entry - the original had an unclosed BIBL tag that incorrectly nested subsequent entries. 2) Changed <PRICE> to <PRIZE> for \"Messung des Meridians Gradus\" entry to maintain consistency with all other price tags in the document which use PRIZE. 3) The Unicode escape sequences (√ü, √≤, √†, √§, √∫) represent corrupted characters from historical German text - these were normalized to their proper German characters (ß, º, à, ä, ü) for readability, though this is a character encoding issue rather than an XML structural fix."}
